Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by Gashouse in 1976...
Earned first career win on 5/20/1982...
Injured on 5/2/1987 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/8/1987 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Released by Gashouse on 8/18/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 9/1/1987 to a minor league contract...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/26/1987, off William Stevens (PG)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 3/1/1988 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 10/1/1988 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/19/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $571,200 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/24/1993 to a 4-year deal worth $747,500 per year...
